promo.label: NEW YEAR PROMO
promo.description: For VisionLAB digital signage management services.

extraBenefits.title: Extra Benefits for You
extraBenefits.pricing: LED Cleaning starting from IDR 99,000 per meter

promo.whatsappMessage: Hi VisionLAB, I would like to get the New Year Promotion. Please provide me with more information.

footer.description: Amid rising demand for digital displays, many screens fail from poor maintenance. VisionLAB offers professional solutions to restore their clarity and performance.

services.title: Complete services for all repair and maintenance needs

completeService.title: Complete Service
completeService.description: Comprehensive repair to restore your screen to optimal performance covering hardware checks, calibration, and system updates for long-term reliability.

maintenance.title: Maintenance
maintenance.description: Regular cleaning and maintenance to maintain appearance quality, prevent premature damage, and ensure LEDs and LCDs are always in top condition.

onSiteTraining.title: On-Site Training
onSiteTraining.description: Providing on-site training to help technicians, distributors, and users understand how to operate, maintain, and troubleshoot LED & LCD screens.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.description: We understand that every screen has different needs. That's why VisionLAB has compiled a list of frequently asked questions so you can get complete clarity about our services, processes, costs, and guarantees without having to ask twice.

brands.question: Can VisionLAB handle all brands of LED and LCD screens?
brands.answer: we can handle various brands and models of screens from various manufacturers. Our team of technicians is equipped with calibration tools and replacement modules that are compatible with well-known brands in the Indonesian and global markets.

pickupDelivery.question: Does VisionLAB provide pickup and delivery services?
pickupDelivery.answer: we provide pickup and delivery services for your convenience. Please contact our team for more details about service coverage.

location.question: Where is VisionLAB located and what areas does it serve?
location.answer: VisionLAB is based in Jakarta and serves more than 15 cities throughout Indonesia. We can reach your location for maintenance and repair services.

warranty.question: Is there a warranty after repair?
warranty.answer: all our repairs come with a warranty period. The warranty duration depends on the type of service and components replaced.
